subject: Football
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Wayne Chrebet, whose N.F.L. career was ended by multiple concussions, was dismayed at the way quarterback Jon Kitna’s concussion was treated last Sunday.
snippet: Wayne Chrebet, whose N.F.L. career was ended by multiple concussions, was dismayed at the way quarterback Jon Kitna’s concussion was treated last Sunday.
